product_name: Patagonia Synchilla Lightweight Snap-T Pullover - Women's
long_description: The classic Patagonia Synchilla Lightweight Snap-T pullover for women, made of 200-weight Synchilla(R) polyester fleece, provides everyday insulating warmth and comfort. Made from warm Synchilla polyester fleece (85% recycled) for moisture wicking, fast-drying, insulating comfort. Supplex(R) nylon trim on stand-up collar reinforces classic Snap-T four-snap placket. Yoke seam detail with Supplex nylon chest pocket flap and snap closure; contrast spandex binding on cuffs and hem. The hip-length Patagonia Synchilla Lightweight Snap-T pullover for women has a regular fit.
short_description: The classic Patagonia Synchilla Lightweight Snap-T pullover for women, made of 200-weight Synchilla(R) polyester fleece, provides everyday insulating warmth and comfort.
